posts.post_content:
Posted By: Martin Neal
Thanks again for all the responses. First email takes it (Pete, I will be more diligent this time). I will pay for shipping and insurance, add 3% for Paypal. Any questions are more scans, please email or feel free to call me at 434-825-6792.  My address is 

Martin Neal
356 Squirrel Path
Charlottesville, Va 22901

Paypal address is lmneal4@aol.com
